subs.text:
Perfect night at the ballpark. Star Wars + baseball combines two of my favourite things, and one of my crushes complimented me on my Baby Yoda enamel pin, which I wore on my hat (inspired move, that one). 

But don’t worry, I didn’t tell her.

subs.text: I’m not even really sure I have a sensitively to loud noise (I like loud concerts), but I’d be all over a Blue Jays game that did this. I’d miss the flashing and strobing (I actually kind of like that), but I’d accept the lack of that if it also meant a quieter experience. [link]
